404.subtext_html: We can't find the page you're looking for.

comments.title: Leave a comment

comments.success: Your comment was posted successfully! Thank you!

general.no_matches: Sorry, there are no products in this collection

form.name: Name

reset_password.subtext: Enter a new password for {{ email }}

onboarding.no_content: This section doesn’t currently include any content. Add content to this section using the sidebar.

issued.title: Here's your {{ value }} gift card for {{ shop }}!

consistent_cart_addon.merge_cart_text: It appears you already have a basket from a previous visit. Would you like to merge your previous basket with your current one?

payment.missing_credit_card_error: Can't process a payment without a valid credit/debit card

field_errors.credit_card_number_invalid: Please enter a valid credit/debit card number

payment_errors.credit_card_processing: We are experiencing technical difficulties while trying to process your credit/debit card. Please try again in a few minutes.
payment_errors.order_total_changed: Your order total ha changed. Refresh your basket

marketing.accept_marketing_checkbox_label: Be the first to hear about exclusive offers and new products via email

unsubscribe.description: Thank you. You won't receive any more basket reminders from us

stock.items_unavailable_notice: Some items are no longer available. Your basket has been updated.

order_summary.cart_does_not_meet_discount_requirements: {{ code }} discount code isn't valid for the items in your basket

shipping.no_rates_for_cart_or_destination_notice: There are no shipping options available for your basket/address

shipping_errors.shipping_method: Your basket has been updated and this shipping rate is no longer valid. Please select a new Shipping option

failed_payment.payment_not_processed_text: You haven't been charged. Return to your basket to complete your purchase.

remember_me.label: Save my info to allow for checkout with Shopify Pay on other sites
